title: Fully exact and fully dualizable module categories
summary:
We define fully exact module categories, a subclass of exact module categories over a finite braided tensor category that is stable under the relative Deligne product. In contrast, we demonstrate with examples in both zero and non-zero characteristic of the base field that the class of exact module categories is not stable under this product. We also observe in examples that fully exact module categories form a dense subset in the class of exact ones.
  The monoidal 2-category of fully exact module categories strictly contains those of invertible and separable module categories. In fact, we show that each internal algebra of a fully exact module category is projectively separable, a generalization of separable algebras involving projective objects. In the semisimple case, a module category is fully exact if and only if it is separable.
  In general, fully exact module categories are not dualizable inside their class, but if they are, they are fully dualizable objects in the monoidal 2-category of finite module categories. We call such module categories perfect. We show that perfect module categories form a rigid monoidal 2-subcategory containing all fully dualizable objects. Therefore, we propose perfect module categories as a model for finite tensor 2-categories. If the braiding is symmetric, a module category is fully exact if and only if it is perfect.
  As a detailed example, we classify fully exact, and hence perfect, module categories over the symmetric tensor category of modules over Sweedler's four-dimensional Hopf algebra and compute their relative Deligne products, and the categories of 1-morphisms. For a general quasi-triangular Hopf algebra, we analyze when the category of finite-dimensional vector spaces is fully exact. We show that this is not the case for both Sweedler's Hopf algebra and Lusztig's factorizable small quantum group of type $A_1$ at an odd root of unity.

AI.tldr: 论文定义了完全精确模范畴，这是有限辫子张量范畴中精确模范畴的一个子类，在相对Deligne积下稳定。证明了完全精确模范畴包含可逆和可分模范畴，并引入了完美模范畴作为有限张量2-范畴的模型。
AI.motivation: 研究有限辫子张量范畴中模范畴的稳定性问题，特别是相对Deligne积下的稳定性。发现精确模范畴在相对Deligne积下不稳定，需要定义更稳定的子类来构建良好的范畴结构。
AI.method: 定义完全精确模范畴作为精确模范畴的子类，证明其在相对Deligne积下稳定。引入完美模范畴作为完全精确模范畴中可对偶化的对象。通过具体例子分析，包括Sweedler四维Hopf代数和Lusztig小量子群。
AI.result: 1. 完全精确模范畴在相对Deligne积下稳定，而精确模范畴不稳定；2. 完全精确模范畴包含可逆和可分模范畴；3. 在对称情况下，完全精确模范畴等价于完美模范畴；4. 对Sweedler Hopf代数分类了完全精确模范畴；5. 证明了某些量子群对应的模范畴不是完全精确的。
AI.conclusion: 完全精确模范畴为研究有限辫子张量范畴中的模范畴提供了稳定的框架，完美模范畴可作为有限张量2-范畴的合适模型。该理论在对称情况下有特别简洁的性质，为后续研究奠定了基础。

title: Highest weight categories via pairs of dual exceptional sequences
summary: In this paper we present criteria in terms of dual pairs of exceptional sequences for an abelian category to be highest weight. The criteria are applied in three situations of geometric origin. We give new proofs for the facts that the category of perverse sheaves of middle perversity on complex-analytic manifolds with suitable conditions on the stratification is highest weight and that the derived coherent category of any Grassmannian has a $t$-structure with highest weight heart. Also we show that the abelian null category of any proper birational morphism of regular surfaces is highest weight. For this null category, we give a geometric description of some special objects related to the highest weight structure, such as standard, costandard and characteristic tilting objects.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了判断阿贝尔范畴是否具有最高权结构的对偶例外序列准则，并将其应用于三个几何场景：复解析流形上的中间反常层范畴、Grassmannian的导出凝聚层范畴，以及正则曲面真双有理态射的零范畴。
AI.motivation: 为阿贝尔范畴是否具有最高权结构提供新的判断准则，特别是针对几何起源的范畴，以简化相关证明并揭示这些范畴的结构特性。
AI.method: 提出了基于对偶例外序列的准则，用于判断阿贝尔范畴是否具有最高权结构。将该准则应用于三个几何场景：1) 复解析流形上满足分层条件的中间反常层范畴；2) Grassmannian的导出凝聚层范畴；3) 正则曲面真双有理态射的零范畴。
AI.result: 1) 给出了复解析流形上中间反常层范畴是最高权范畴的新证明；2) 证明了任何Grassmannian的导出凝聚层范畴具有带最高权心的t-结构；3) 证明了正则曲面真双有理态射的零范畴是最高权范畴，并给出了标准、余标准和特征倾斜对象等特殊对象的几何描述。
AI.conclusion: 提出的对偶例外序列准则为判断阿贝尔范畴是否具有最高权结构提供了有效工具，特别适用于几何起源的范畴。这些结果不仅简化了相关证明，还揭示了这些几何范畴的深层结构特性。

title: Asymptotic Expansion for Expanding Spherical Averages in Real Rank One
summary: This paper develops precise asymptotic formulas for expanding non-spherical averages on compact quotients of real rank-one Lie groups, focusing on $SO(n,1)$ as a model case. Using tools from harmonic analysis and representation theory, the study reduces the analysis of orbit averages to an ordinary (ODE) derived from the action of the Casimir operator.

AI.tldr: 该论文为实秩一李群紧商空间上的非球面平均展开建立了精确的渐近公式，以SO(n,1)为模型案例。
AI.motivation: 研究实秩一李群紧商空间上非球面平均的渐近行为，这类问题在调和分析和表示理论中具有重要意义，特别是在理解轨道平均的渐近展开方面。
AI.method: 运用调和分析和表示理论工具，将轨道平均的分析简化为由Casimir算子作用导出的常微分方程（ODE）。
AI.result: 建立了精确的渐近展开公式，具体针对SO(n,1)模型案例，为非球面平均提供了数学上严格的渐近描述。
AI.conclusion: 通过将轨道平均问题转化为ODE分析，成功推导出实秩一李群紧商空间上非球面平均的精确渐近公式，为相关领域研究提供了新的分析框架。

title: Synchronization points: growth, asymptotics, congruences, and the synchronization zeta function
summary: In this paper, we introduce the synchronization zeta function associated with a pair of self-maps of a topological space and investigate its properties. We also define the growth rate of synchronization points and derive an explicit formula in the setting of endomorphisms of compact, connected Abelian groups. In addition, we establish Gauss congruences and describe the asymptotic behavior for the sequence of numbers of synchronization points, under the assumption that the synchronization zeta function is rational. Further, we discuss connections with topological entropy and Reidemeister torsion.

AI.tldr: 本文引入了拓扑空间上自映射对的同步zeta函数，研究了其性质，定义了同步点的增长率，在紧连通阿贝尔群自同态背景下给出了显式公式，建立了高斯同余关系，描述了同步点数列的渐近行为，并探讨了与拓扑熵和Reidemeister挠率的关系。
AI.motivation: 研究拓扑空间上自映射对的同步点理论，建立同步zeta函数这一新工具，探索同步点数列的算术性质和渐近行为，连接动力系统、代数拓扑和数论等不同数学领域。
AI.method: 引入同步zeta函数作为同步点计数的生成函数；在紧连通阿贝尔群自同态背景下推导显式公式；假设zeta函数为有理函数时建立高斯同余关系；分析同步点数列的渐近行为；探讨与拓扑熵和Reidemeister挠率的联系。
AI.result: 建立了同步zeta函数的基本性质；在紧连通阿贝尔群自同态情形下得到了同步点增长率的显式公式；证明了高斯同余关系；描述了同步点数列的渐近行为；揭示了同步zeta函数与拓扑熵、Reidemeister挠率之间的深刻联系。
AI.conclusion: 同步zeta函数为研究拓扑空间上自映射对的同步点提供了有力工具，在特定代数背景下可得到精确结果，其有理性与高斯同余、渐近行为密切相关，且与拓扑熵和Reidemeister挠率等经典概念存在内在联系，为动力系统与代数拓扑的交叉研究开辟了新方向。

title: Center of the affine $\mathfrak{gl}_{n|1}$ at the critical level and pseudo-differential operators
summary:
We prove that the center of the affine Lie algebra $\widehat{\mathfrak{gl}}_{n|1}$ at the critical level is generated by the coefficients in the expansion of the pseudo-differential operator $(\partial_z-u_1(z))\cdots (\partial_z-u_n(z))(\partial_z+u_{n+1}(z))^{-1}$ taking values in the Cartan subalgebra. This is an affine analogue of the Harish-Chandra isomorphism in the finite case.
  The key ingredient of the proof is the identification of the center with the Heisenberg coset of the regular W-superalgebra of $\mathfrak{gl}_{n|1}$ at the critical level, whose associated graded algebra is realized as the affine supersymmetric polynomials. Based on this, we derive a character formula for the center, which coincides with the generating function of plane partitions with a pit condition. We also prove that the Heisenberg coset at generic levels has a similar interpretation in terms of pseudo-differential operators that deform the one at the critical level.

AI.tldr: 证明了仿射李代数 $\widehat{\mathfrak{gl}}_{n|1}$ 在临界水平下的中心由伪微分算子展开系数生成，这是有限情况Harish-Chandra同构的仿射类比。
AI.motivation: 研究仿射李代数 $\widehat{\mathfrak{gl}}_{n|1}$ 在临界水平下的中心结构，建立与有限情况Harish-Chandra同构的仿射类比。
AI.method: 通过将中心识别为正则W-超代数的Heisenberg陪集，其关联分次代数实现为仿射超对称多项式，并利用伪微分算子展开。
AI.result: 证明了中心由伪微分算子 $(\partial_z-u_1(z))\cdots (\partial_z-u_n(z))(\partial_z+u_{n+1}(z))^{-1}$ 的展开系数生成，推导了中心的特征公式，该公式与具有坑条件的平面划分生成函数一致。
AI.conclusion: 建立了仿射李代数 $\widehat{\mathfrak{gl}}_{n|1}$ 在临界水平下中心的完整描述，并证明了一般水平下的Heisenberg陪集也有类似的伪微分算子解释。

title: Reduction theorems for a conjecture on basis in source algebras of blocks of finite groups
summary: The aim of this short research note is to present some results about a conjecture of Barker and Gelvin claiming that any source algebra of a block of a finite group has the unit group containing a basis stabilised by the left and right actions of the defect group. We obtain some reduction theorems for the existence of stable unital basis in source algebras of block algebras. Along the way we investigate this problem for the blocks of some finite simple groups.

AI.tldr: 该研究笔记探讨了Barker和Gelvin关于有限群块源代数单位群包含由缺陷群左右作用稳定的基的猜想，获得了一些稳定幺正基存在性的约化定理，并研究了某些有限单群的块。
AI.motivation: 研究Barker和Gelvin提出的猜想：任何有限群块的源代数，其单位群都包含一个由缺陷群的左右作用稳定的基。这个猜想涉及模表示论中源代数的结构性质。
AI.method:
1. 为块代数源代数中稳定幺正基的存在性获得了一些约化定理
2. 研究了某些有限单群的块，探讨该猜想在这些特殊情况下的成立性
AI.result: 获得了一些关于稳定幺正基存在性的约化定理，这些定理有助于简化验证该猜想的过程。通过对某些有限单群块的研究，进一步了解了该猜想在具体群中的成立情况。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为Barker和Gelvin关于源代数单位群包含稳定基的猜想提供了理论支持，通过约化定理简化了验证过程，并对有限单群的块进行了初步探索，为进一步研究该猜想奠定了基础。

title: Identifiable Equivariant Networks are Layerwise Equivariant
summary: We investigate the relation between end-to-end equivariance and layerwise equivariance in deep neural networks. We prove the following: For a network whose end-to-end function is equivariant with respect to group actions on the input and output spaces, there is a parameter choice yielding the same end-to-end function such that its layers are equivariant with respect to some group actions on the latent spaces. Our result assumes that the parameters of the model are identifiable in an appropriate sense. This identifiability property has been established in the literature for a large class of networks, to which our results apply immediately, while it is conjectural for others. The theory we develop is grounded in an abstract formalism, and is therefore architecture-agnostic. Overall, our results provide a mathematical explanation for the emergence of equivariant structures in the weights of neural networks during training -- a phenomenon that is consistently observed in practice.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了端到端等变神经网络存在参数选择使得其各层也具有等变性，为实践中观察到的网络权重等变结构提供了数学解释。
AI.motivation: 研究深度神经网络中层间等变性与端到端等变性之间的关系，解释实践中观察到的神经网络权重在训练过程中自然形成等变结构的现象。
AI.method: 采用抽象形式化方法，基于参数可识别性假设，证明对于端到端等变的网络，存在参数选择使得其各层也具有等变性。该方法与具体架构无关。
AI.result: 证明了端到端等变神经网络存在参数选择使得其各层也具有等变性，为实践中观察到的网络权重等变结构提供了数学解释。
AI.conclusion: 端到端等变性可以转化为层间等变性，这为理解神经网络训练过程中等变结构的自然出现提供了理论依据。

title: Admissible modules over affine Lie superalgebras: The final step in the characterization
summary: Over the past three decades, there have been several attempts to characterize modules over affine Lie superalgebras. One of the main issues in this regard is dealing with zero-level modules. In this paper, we study these modules and {complete the characterization} of simple admissible modules over affine Lie superalgebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文完成了仿射李超代数上简单可容许模的分类，特别是解决了零级模这一长期存在的问题。
AI.motivation: 过去三十年来，研究者们多次尝试对仿射李超代数上的模进行分类，但零级模的处理一直是主要难题。本文旨在解决这一问题，完成对仿射李超代数上简单可容许模的完整分类。
AI.method: 论文研究了仿射李超代数上的零级模，并在此基础上完成了对简单可容许模的完整分类。具体方法涉及对零级模的深入分析和处理。
AI.result: 成功完成了仿射李超代数上简单可容许模的完整分类，解决了长期存在的零级模问题。
AI.conclusion: 该研究填补了仿射李超代数模分类领域的空白，为后续相关研究提供了完整的理论基础。

title: Explicit Construction of Maass Wave Forms and Their Petersson Inner Products
summary: In this paper, we explicitly construct Maass wave cusp forms associated to Hecke characters on arbitrary real quadratic fields. This result is a generalization of Maass (1949), who constructed Maass wave cusp forms under the assumption that narrow class number is one. We also compute its Petersson inner product explicitly and give a few examples involving dihedral Artin representation.

AI.tldr: 本文显式构造了任意实二次域上Hecke特征标对应的Maass波尖点形式，推广了Maass(1949)在窄类数为1条件下的结果，并显式计算了其Petersson内积，给出了涉及二面体Artin表示的例子。
AI.motivation: Maass(1949)在窄类数为1的条件下构造了Maass波尖点形式，但这一限制条件较强。本文旨在推广这一构造，使其适用于任意实二次域，从而扩展Maass波尖点形式的适用范围。
AI.method: 通过显式构造方法，将Maass波尖点形式与Hecke特征标关联起来，并显式计算了Petersson内积。方法涉及实二次域的算术性质和Hecke特征标的分析。
AI.result: 成功构造了任意实二次域上Hecke特征标对应的Maass波尖点形式，显式计算了其Petersson内积，并给出了涉及二面体Artin表示的具体例子。
AI.conclusion: 本文推广了Maass(1949)的结果，为任意实二次域上的Maass波尖点形式提供了显式构造，并建立了与Hecke特征标和二面体Artin表示的联系，扩展了该领域的研究范围。

title: New examples of non-Fourier-Mukai exact functors via non-isomorphic octahedra
summary: We study a triangulated category $\mathscr S$ that admits a full and strong exceptional sequence of three objects with one-dimensional Hom spaces. We show that the isomorphism classes of exact functors from $\mathscr S$ to another triangulated category $\mathscr T$ are in bijection with the isomorphism classes of octahedra in $\mathscr T$ satisfying a natural condition. As an application, we construct an exact functor from $\mathscr S$ to $\mathbf D^b(\Bbbk[x]\text{-}\mathrm{mod})$ that does not admit a dg lift. This provides an explicit example of a non-Fourier-Mukai exact functor between $\mathbf D^b(\mathbb P^2)$ and $\mathbf D^b(\mathbb P^1)$.

AI.tldr: 研究具有三个对象的一维Hom空间的完全强例外序列的三角范畴，建立了从该范畴到其他三角范畴的精确函子与满足自然条件的八面体之间的双射关系，并构造了一个没有dg提升的精确函子示例。
AI.motivation: 研究具有特定例外序列的三角范畴的精确函子分类问题，特别是探索非Fourier-Mukai型精确函子的存在性，为理解三角范畴间的函子结构提供新视角。
AI.method: 通过分析具有三个对象的一维Hom空间的完全强例外序列的三角范畴，建立精确函子与满足自然条件的八面体之间的对应关系，利用八面体公理来刻画函子结构。
AI.result: 证明了从该三角范畴到其他三角范畴的精确函子同构类与满足自然条件的八面体同构类之间存在双射关系，并构造了一个从该范畴到D^b(k[x]-mod)的精确函子，该函子没有dg提升。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为三角范畴间的精确函子分类提供了新的几何视角（通过八面体），并给出了非Fourier-Mukai型精确函子的具体示例，深化了对三角范畴函子理论的理解。

title: Log-concavity and unimodality of cluster monomials of type $A_3$
comment: 24 pages, 4 figures. All comments are welcome!
summary: The log-concavity of cluster variables of type $A_n$ and cluster monomials of type $A_2$ was established by Chen-Huang-Sun. It is still a conjecture for the cluster monomials of higher rank. In this paper, we prove the log-concavity and unimodality of the cluster monomials of type $A_3$, a substantially more intricate case. Moreover, we refine and extend this conjecture by considering the unimodality and the strongly isomorphism of cluster algebras.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了A3型簇单项式的对数凹性和单峰性，这是对Chen-Huang-Sun关于An型簇变量和A2型簇单项式结果的推广，并提出了关于簇代数单峰性和强同构性的新猜想。
AI.motivation: Chen-Huang-Sun已经建立了An型簇变量和A2型簇单项式的对数凹性，但对于更高秩的簇单项式仍是一个猜想。本文旨在解决A3型簇单项式的对数凹性和单峰性问题，这是一个更为复杂的案例。
AI.method: 通过数学证明方法，处理A3型簇单项式这一复杂情况，建立其对数凹性和单峰性性质。
AI.result: 成功证明了A3型簇单项式的对数凹性和单峰性，这是对现有猜想的重要进展。
AI.conclusion: 本文不仅证明了A3型簇单项式的对数凹性和单峰性，还通过考虑簇代数的单峰性和强同构性，对原有猜想进行了精炼和扩展。

title: A family of simple $U(\mathfrak{h})$-free modules of rank 2 over $\mathfrak{sl} (2)$
summary: We study simple $\mathfrak{sl}(2)$-modules over $\mathbb C$ that are free of finite rank as $U(\mathfrak h)$-modules, where $\mathfrak h$ is a Cartan subalgebra of $\mathfrak{sl}(2)$. Our main result is an explicit classification of the scalar-type simple modules of rank $2$. We also give a criterion for when two such modules are isomorphic. Both the classification and the isomorphism problem reduce to twisted conjugacy classes in $\mbox{GL}_2({\mathbb C}[h])$ and rely on Cohn's standard form.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了复数域上作为U(𝔥)-模有限秩自由的简单𝔰𝔩(2)-模，主要对秩为2的标量型简单模进行了显式分类，并给出了同构判定准则。
AI.motivation: 研究𝔰𝔩(2)代数的简单模结构，特别是那些作为Cartan子代数𝔥的泛包络代数U(𝔥)-模具有有限秩自由结构的模。这类模在表示论中具有重要意义，但完整的分类尚未完全解决。
AI.method: 将分类问题和同构问题转化为GL₂(ℂ[h])中的扭曲共轭类问题，利用Cohn标准型理论进行分析。通过代数方法将模结构参数化，建立与矩阵群中特定等价关系的联系。
AI.result: 获得了秩为2的标量型简单𝔰𝔩(2)-模的显式分类，建立了这类模的完整描述。同时给出了两个这样的模同构的判定准则，将同构问题转化为GL₂(ℂ[h])中的扭曲共轭类等价问题。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功分类了秩为2的标量型简单𝔰𝔩(2)-模，并提供了同构判定方法。结果表明这类模的分类可以归结为多项式环上矩阵群的扭曲共轭类问题，为更高秩模的分类提供了理论基础和方法框架。

title: $q$-deformations of the Tsetlin library
summary: The Tsetlin library is a random shuffling process on permutations of $n$ letters, where each letter $i$ can be interpreted as a book; book $i$ is brought to the front of the bookshelf with an assigned probability $x_i$. We define a $q$-deformation of the Tsetlin library by replacing the symmetric group action on permutations by the action of the type $A$ Iwahori-Hecke algebra. We compute the stationary distribution and spectrum of this Markov chain by relating it to a Markov chain on complete flags over the finite field vector space $\mathbb{F}_q^n$ and applying techniques from semigroup theory. We also generalize the $q$-Tsetlin library to words (with repeated letters), and compute its stationary distribution and spectrum.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种Tsetlin图书馆的q-变形，通过用Iwahori-Hecke代数作用替换对称群作用，并计算了该马尔可夫链的平稳分布和谱。
AI.motivation: Tsetlin图书馆是一个在n个字母排列上的随机洗牌过程，传统模型基于对称群作用。本文旨在通过引入q-变形，用Iwahori-Hecke代数作用替代对称群作用，从而扩展该模型的理论框架和应用范围。
AI.method: 通过将q-Tsetlin图书馆与有限域向量空间上完全旗的马尔可夫链相关联，并应用半群理论技术来计算平稳分布和谱。同时将模型推广到带重复字母的单词情况。
AI.result: 成功计算了q-Tsetlin图书馆马尔可夫链的平稳分布和谱，并将结果推广到带重复字母的单词情况，建立了与有限域向量空间上完全旗马尔可夫链的联系。
AI.conclusion: 本文通过引入q-变形扩展了Tsetlin图书馆模型，建立了与Iwahori-Hecke代数和有限域向量空间的联系，为相关随机过程的研究提供了新的理论工具和计算方法。

title: Further results on fuzzy negations and implications induced by fuzzy conjunctions and disjunctions
summary: In this article, we deeply investigate some properties of fuzzy negations induced from fuzzy conjunctions (resp. disjunctions), which are then applied to characterizing the fuzzy negations. We further use the obtained characterization of fuzzy negations to explore some properties of $(D,N)$-implications generated from fuzzy disjunctions and negations. We finally describe $(D,N)$-implications (resp. continuous $(D,N)$-implications) generated from fuzzy disjunctions and negations.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了由模糊合取（或析取）诱导的模糊否定的性质，并将其应用于模糊否定的表征，然后利用这些结果探索由模糊析取和否定生成的(D,N)-蕴涵的性质。
AI.motivation: 研究模糊逻辑中由模糊合取和析取诱导的模糊否定的性质，为模糊否定的表征提供理论基础，并进一步探索由模糊析取和否定生成的(D,N)-蕴涵的特性。
AI.method: 深入研究了由模糊合取（或析取）诱导的模糊否定的性质，将这些性质应用于模糊否定的表征，然后利用获得的模糊否定表征来探索由模糊析取和否定生成的(D,N)-蕴涵的性质。
AI.result: 获得了模糊否定的表征结果，并探索了由模糊析取和否定生成的(D,N)-蕴涵的性质，最终描述了由模糊析取和否定生成的(D,N)-蕴涵（特别是连续的(D,N)-蕴涵）。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为模糊逻辑中模糊否定的表征提供了理论基础，并深入分析了(D,N)-蕴涵的性质，为模糊逻辑系统的构建和应用提供了理论支持。

title: On the Integrable Structure of the SU(2) Wess-Zumino-Novikov-Witten Model
summary: This paper is devoted to the quantum integrable structure of Wess-Zumino-Novikov-Witten models, formed by an infinite number of commuting Integrals of Motion (IMs) in their current algebra. Focusing for simplicity on the SU(2) case, we obtain the first four commuting higher-spin local IMs, starting from a general SU(2)-invariant ansatz and imposing their commutativity. We further show evidence of their commutativity with quantum non-local IMs, which were already built in the literature as Kondo defects. We then investigate the diagonalization of these local operators on $\widehat{\mathfrak{su}(2)}_k$ Verma modules: we explicitly find the first few eigenvectors and further discuss the affine Bethe ansatz and ODE/IQFT conjectures, which predict the full eigenstates and spectrum of the integrable structure. Our results show a perfect match between the direct diagonalization and these overarching conjectures. We conclude by discussing several outlooks, including multi-current generalisations, massive deformations and a general long-term program towards the first principle quantisation of 2-dimensional integrable sigma-models.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了WZNW模型的量子可积结构，聚焦于SU(2)情形，通过构造前四个对易的高自旋局域运动积分，验证了它们与已知非局域运动积分的对易性，并在Verma模上对角化这些算子，结果与仿射Bethe ansatz及ODE/IQFT猜想完美吻合。
AI.motivation: 研究Wess-Zumino-Novikov-Witten模型的量子可积结构，特别是其流代数中无限多个对易运动积分的构造和性质，为二维可积sigma模型的第一性原理量子化奠定基础。
AI.method: 从一般的SU(2)不变ansatz出发，通过施加对易性条件构造前四个对易的高自旋局域运动积分；验证这些局域算子与文献中作为Kondo缺陷构建的量子非局域运动积分的对易性；在仿射李代数Verma模上对角化这些局域算子，寻找特征向量。
AI.result: 成功构造了前四个对易的高自旋局域运动积分；证明了它们与量子非局域运动积分的对易性；在Verma模上找到了前几个特征向量；直接对角化结果与仿射Bethe ansatz和ODE/IQFT猜想预测的完整特征态和谱完美匹配。
AI.conclusion: 论文为WZNW模型的量子可积结构提供了具体实现，验证了相关数学物理猜想的正确性，并为多流推广、质量形变以及二维可积sigma模型的第一性原理量子化这一长期目标奠定了基础。

title: Algebraic Geometry for Spin-Adapted Coupled Cluster Theory
summary: We develop and numerically analyze an algebraic-geometric framework for spin-adapted coupled-cluster (CC) theory. Since the electronic Hamiltonian is SU(2)-invariant, physically relevant quantum states lie in the spin singlet sector. We give an explicit description of the SU(2)-invariant (spin singlet) many-body space by identifying it with an Artinian commutative ring, called the excitation ring, whose dimension is governed by a Narayana number. We define spin-adapted truncation varieties via embeddings of graded subspaces of this ring, and we identify the CCS truncation variety with the Veronese square of the Grassmannian. Compared to the spin-generalized formulation, this approach yields a substantial reduction in dimension and degree, with direct computational consequences. In particular, the CC degree of the truncation variety -- governing the number of homotopy paths required to compute all CC solutions -- is reduced by orders of magnitude. We present scaling studies demonstrating asymptotic improvements and we exploit this reduction to compute the full solution landscape of spin-adapted CC equations for water and lithium hydride.

AI.tldr: 开发了自旋适应耦合簇理论的代数几何框架，通过识别SU(2)不变多体空间与激发环，显著降低了维度与计算复杂度。
AI.motivation: 由于电子哈密顿量具有SU(2)不变性，物理相关的量子态位于自旋单重态子空间。传统自旋广义方法存在维度冗余，需要开发更高效的自旋适应框架来减少计算复杂度。
AI.method: 将SU(2)不变多体空间识别为Artinian交换环（激发环），其维度由Narayana数控制。通过嵌入该环的分级子空间定义自旋适应截断簇，并将CCS截断簇识别为Grassmannian的Veronese平方。
AI.result: 相比自旋广义公式，该方法在维度和次数上实现显著降低。耦合簇截断簇的次数（决定计算所有解所需同伦路径数）降低了几个数量级。缩放研究显示渐近改进，并成功计算了水和氢化锂的自旋适应耦合簇方程完整解空间。
AI.conclusion: 代数几何框架为自旋适应耦合簇理论提供了系统方法，通过利用SU(2)对称性大幅降低计算复杂度，使完整解空间计算成为可能，为量子化学计算提供了更高效的工具。

title: Integral cluster structures on quantized coordinate rings
comment: v1 42 pages; v2 47 pages, Appendix A is added
summary: We develop (quantum) cluster algebra structures over arbitrary commutative unital rings $\Bbbk$ and prove that the (quantized) coordinate rings of connected simply-connected complex simple algebraic groups $G$ over $\Bbbk$ admit such structures. We first show that the integral form of the quantized coordinate ring of $G$ admits an upper quantum cluster algebra structure over $\mathbb{A}=\mathbb{Z}[q^{\pm\frac{1}{2}}]$ by using a combination of tools from quantum groups, canonical bases and cluster algebras and a previous result of the second and third authors over $\mathbb{Q}(q^{\frac{1}{2}})$. We then obtain (integral) quantum versions of recent results of the first author: when $G$ is not of type $F_4$, the quantized coordinate ring of $G$ admits a quantum cluster algebra structure over $\mathbb{A}'$, where $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{A}$ when $G$ is not of types $G_2$, $E_8$, and $F_4$; $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{A}[(q^2+1)^{-1}]$ when $G$ is of type $G_2$, and $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{Q}(q^{\frac{1}{2}})$ when $G$ is of type $E_8$. We furthermore prove that the classical versions of these results hold over $\mathbb{A}'$ (where $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{Z}$ if $G$ is not of type $F_4$ or $G_2$ and $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{Z}[\frac{1}{2}]$ if $G$ is of type $G_2$) and that the integral form of the coordinate ring of $G$ of type $F_4$ is an upper cluster algebra. Finally, by using common triangular bases of (quantum) cluster algebras, we prove that the above results also hold under specializations of $\mathbb{A}$ and $\mathbb{A}'$ to commutative unital rings $\Bbbk$.

AI.tldr: 该论文在任意交换幺环上发展了（量子）丛代数结构，证明了连通单连通复单代数群的（量子化）坐标环具有这样的结构。
AI.motivation: 研究代数群坐标环的量子丛代数结构，将量子群、典范基和丛代数的工具结合起来，推广到更一般的环上。
AI.method: 结合量子群、典范基和丛代数的工具，利用作者先前在有理函数域上的结果，通过积分形式和三角基的方法构造量子丛代数结构。
AI.result: 证明了除F4型外的所有单连通复单代数群的量子坐标环具有量子丛代数结构，并在不同环上给出了具体形式；经典版本的结果也成立；F4型的积分形式是上丛代数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功地将量子丛代数结构推广到任意交换幺环上，为代数群坐标环提供了统一的丛代数描述，并通过特殊化证明了结果的广泛适用性。

title: Leading terms of relations on a level 5 module over the twisted affine Lie algebra $A_2^{(2)}$
comment: 15 pages, submitted to a Special Volume in honor of Jim Lepowsky's 80th birthday
summary: One of the starting points of this work was the duality of Borcea relating standard level $k$ representations of $A_1^{(1)}$ and level $2k+1$ of $A_2^{(2)}$. For $k=1$ the combinatorial bases in both cases yield the two Capparelli identities and we wanted to see if there is a correspondence between the bases in terms of partitions for all $k\in\mathbb N$. By using the vertex operator relations in the principal picture for level $5$ standard $A_2^{(2)}$-modules we reduce a spanning set of Poincare-Birkhoff-Witt-type vectors in $L(5Λ_0)$ by removing the leading terms of relations and rendering a list of 34 ``difference'' conditions for partitions.We have with computer programs sorted out the sets of partitions satisfying these conditions and formed the partial generating series which agrees with the principally specialized character for all powers of $q$ up to $41$. Although our list of leading terms is incomplete, our results show that the corresponding combinatorial identity for $L_{A_2^{(2)}}(5Λ_0)$ drastically differs from the one for the Borcea dual $L_{A_1^{(1)}}(2Λ_0)$.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了Borcea对偶关系在A₁⁽¹⁾和A₂⁽²⁾表示之间的组合对应，特别关注k=5时的情况。通过顶点算子关系简化了PBW型向量集，得到了34个"差分"条件，并通过计算机验证了这些条件对应的生成函数与特征公式在q的41次幂内一致。
AI.motivation: 研究的起点是Borcea对偶关系，该关系将A₁⁽¹⁾的标准k级表示与A₂⁽²⁾的2k+1级表示联系起来。作者想探究对于所有k∈ℕ，这两种情况下组合基之间是否存在分区对应关系，特别是k=1时对应Capparelli恒等式的情况。
AI.method: 使用A₂⁽²⁾标准5级模的主图顶点算子关系，简化了L(5Λ₀)中的PBW型向量生成集。通过移除关系的主导项，得到了34个"差分"条件用于分区。利用计算机程序筛选满足这些条件的分区集，并构造部分生成级数。
AI.result: 计算得到的部分生成级数与主特化特征在q的41次幂内完全一致。尽管主导项列表不完整，但结果表明L_{A₂⁽²⁾}(5Λ₀)对应的组合恒等式与Borcea对偶的L_{A₁⁽¹⁾}(2Λ₀)对应的恒等式存在显著差异。
AI.conclusion: 研究证实了在k=5时，A₂⁽²⁾的5级表示与A₁⁽¹⁾的2级表示（通过Borcea对偶相关）对应的组合恒等式存在本质差异，这深化了对这两种代数表示之间组合对应关系的理解。

title: Some remarks on invariants
comment: V2: 52 pages (including 5 appendixes), comments and references added
summary: The demand to know the structure of functionally independent invariants of tensor fields arises in many problems of theoretical and mathematical physics, for instance for the construction of interacting higher-order tensor field actions. In mathematical terms the problem can be formulated as follows. Given a semi-simple finite-dimensional Lie algebra $\mathfrak g$ and a $\mathfrak g$-module $V$, one may ask about the structure of the sub-ring of $\mathfrak g$-invariants inside the ring freely generated by the module. We point out how some information about the ring of invariants may be obtained by studying an extended Lie algebra. Numerous examples are given, with particular focus on the difficult problem of classifying invariants of a self-dual 5-form in 10 dimensions.

AI.tldr: 研究半单李代数及其模的环结构，通过扩展李代数方法分析不变量，特别关注10维自对偶5-形式不变量分类
AI.motivation: 理论物理和数学物理中许多问题需要了解张量场函数独立不变量的结构，特别是构建高阶张量场相互作用作用量时。数学上可表述为：给定半单有限维李代数及其模，研究自由生成模环中的子环结构。
AI.method: 通过研究扩展李代数来获取不变量环的结构信息。该方法应用于多个示例，特别关注10维自对偶5-形式不变量的分类这一难题。
AI.result: 提供了多个示例说明扩展李代数方法如何帮助分析不变量环的结构，特别针对10维自对偶5-形式不变量分类问题进行了深入研究。
AI.conclusion: 扩展李代数方法为研究半单李代数模的不变量环结构提供了有效途径，特别是在处理复杂问题如10维自对偶5-形式不变量分类时具有重要价值。

title: Depth Preservation and Close-Field Transfer in the Local Langlands Correspondence
comment: 49 pages; The exposition has been improved. Several inaccuracies corrected. Comments are welcome
summary: We introduce a revised notion of depth for Langlands parameters for tori defined over a nonarchimedean local field \(F\) that restores depth preservation under the local Langlands correspondence (LLC). We leverage that preservation to derive structural results that, taken together, yield a canonical transfer of broad harmonic-analytic results from characteristic \(0\) to characteristic \(p\). When \(F\) has suitably large positive characteristic, we prove a block-by-block equivalence: each Bernstein block of \(G(F)\) is equivalent to a corresponding block for some \(G'(F')\) with \(F'\) of characteristic \(0\) \(\ell\)-close to \(F\); using this, we show that a LLC in characteristic \(0\) corresponds canonically to a LLC in characteristic \(p\). For regular supercuspidals we give a direct, more structured construction via Kaletha. Along the way we recover and extend results on \(\ell\)-close fields -- introducing a depth-transfer function generalizing the normalized Hasse--Herbrand function, proving truncated isomorphisms for arbitrary tori and parahorics, establishing a depth and supercuspidality preserving Kazhdan-type Hecke-algebra isomorphism for arbitrary maximal parahorics of arbitrary connected reductive groups; and a generalized Cartan decomposition for arbitrary maximal parahorics -- thereby subsuming several earlier results in the literature. Collectively, the results let one work in characteristic \(0\) without loss of generality for a wide swath of harmonic analysis on \(p\)-adic groups.

AI.tldr: 本文重新定义了非阿基米德局部域上环面的Langlands参数的深度概念，恢复了局部Langlands对应下的深度保持性，并利用这一性质将调和分析结果从特征0转移到特征p。
AI.motivation: 现有的Langlands参数深度概念在局部Langlands对应下不能保持深度，这限制了调和分析结果在不同特征域之间的转移。本文旨在修正深度概念，建立特征0和特征p之间的桥梁。
AI.method: 1. 重新定义环面Langlands参数的深度概念；2. 利用深度保持性推导结构结果；3. 证明块等价定理：当F具有足够大的正特征时，每个Bernstein块与某个特征0域的对应块等价；4. 对于正则超尖表示，通过Kaletha方法给出更直接的构造；5. 引入深度转移函数、证明截断同构、建立Kazhdan型Hecke代数同构。
AI.result: 1. 建立了深度保持的局部Langlands对应；2. 证明了特征p和特征0之间的块等价定理；3. 实现了调和分析结果从特征0到特征p的规范转移；4. 恢复并扩展了ℓ-接近域的相关结果；5. 建立了任意极大抛物子群的广义Cartan分解。
AI.conclusion: 本文通过修正深度概念和建立块等价关系，使得在特征0中研究p-adic群的调和分析时不会损失一般性，为特征p情形提供了规范的基础，统一并推广了文献中的多个结果。

title: Langlands branching rule for type B snake modules
summary: We prove that each snake module of the quantum Kac-Moody algebra of type $B_n^{(1)}$ admits a Langlands dual representation, as conjectured by Frenkel and Hernandez (Lett. Math. Phys. (2011) 96:217-261). Furthermore, we establish an explicit formula, called the Langlands branching rule, which gives the multiplicities in the decomposition of the character of a snake module of the quantum Kac-Moody algebra of type $B_n^{(1)}$ into a sum of characters of irreducible representations of its Langlands dual algebra.

AI.tldr: 证明了B_n^(1)型量子Kac-Moody代数的蛇模具有Langlands对偶表示，并建立了明确的Langlands分支规则公式
AI.motivation: 验证Frenkel和Hernandez在2011年提出的猜想，即B_n^(1)型量子Kac-Moody代数的蛇模具有Langlands对偶表示
AI.method: 通过数学证明方法，建立了B_n^(1)型量子Kac-Moody代数的蛇模与其Langlands对偶代数之间的表示论对应关系
AI.result: 成功证明了每个蛇模都承认Langlands对偶表示，并推导出了明确的Langlands分支规则公式，该公式给出了蛇模特征分解为对偶代数不可约表示特征之和的重数
AI.conclusion: 完全证实了Frenkel-Hernandez猜想，为B_n^(1)型量子Kac-Moody代数的表示论建立了重要的Langlands对偶理论框架

title: On the additive image of 0th persistent homology
summary:
For $X$ a finite category and $F$ a finite field, we study the additive image of the functor $\operatorname{H}_0(-,F) \colon \operatorname{rep}(X, \mathbf{Top}) \to \operatorname{rep}(X, \mathbf{Vect}_F)$, or equivalently, of the free functor $\operatorname{rep}(X, \mathbf{Set}) \to \operatorname{rep}(X, \mathbf{Vect}_F)$.
  We characterize all finite categories $X$ for which the indecomposables in the additive image coincide with the indecomposable indicator representations and provide examples of quivers of wild representation type where the additive image contains only finitely many indecomposables. Motivated by questions in topological data analysis, we conduct a detailed analysis of the additive image for finite grids. In particular, we show that for grids of infinite representation type, there exist infinitely many indecomposables both within and outside the additive image.
  We develop an algorithm for determining if a representation of a finite category is in the additive image. In addition, we investigate conditions for realizability and the effect of modifications of the source category and the underlying field.
  The paper concludes with a discussion of the additive image of $\operatorname{H}_n(-,F)$ for an arbitrary field $F$, extending previous work for prime fields.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了有限范畴表示理论中同调函子的加性像问题，特别关注拓扑表示到向量空间表示的转换，并开发了判断表示是否在加性像中的算法。
AI.motivation: 研究动机源于拓扑数据分析中的问题，需要理解从拓扑表示到向量空间表示的转换过程，特别是同调函子H₀(-,F)的加性像结构。
AI.method: 采用范畴表示理论方法，分析有限范畴的表示，开发算法判断表示是否在加性像中，研究源范畴修改和基域变化的影响，并扩展到一般域上的Hₙ(-,F)。
AI.result: 刻画了加性像中不可分解表示与不可分解指示表示一致的有限范畴；发现野表示型箭图加性像中只有有限个不可分解表示；对有限网格进行了详细分析，证明无限表示型网格在加性像内外都有无限个不可分解表示。
AI.conclusion: 论文系统研究了同调函子的加性像问题，建立了算法工具，将先前对素域的结果扩展到任意域，为拓扑数据分析提供了理论支持。

title: Local cohomology with support in Schubert varieties
comment: 29 pages, v2: generalized results in Section 2.2, added Example 1.4. To appear in Compositio Mathematica
summary: This paper is concerned with local cohomology sheaves on generalized flag varieties supported in closed Schubert varieties, which carry natural structures as (mixed Hodge) D-modules. We employ Kazhdan--Lusztig theory and Saito's theory of mixed Hodge modules to describe a general strategy to calculate the simple composition factors, Hodge filtration, and weight filtration on these modules. Our main tool is the Grothendieck--Cousin complex, introduced by Kempf, which allows us to relate the local cohomology modules in question to parabolic Verma modules over the corresponding Lie algebra. We show that this complex underlies a complex of mixed Hodge modules, and is thus endowed with Hodge and weight filtrations. As a consequence, strictness implies that computing cohomology commutes with taking associated graded with respect to both of these filtrations. We execute this strategy to calculate the composition factors and weight filtration for Schubert varieties in the Grassmannian, in particular showing that the weight filtration is controlled by the augmented Dyck patterns of Raicu--Weyman. As an application, upon restriction to the opposite big cell, we recover the simple composition factors and weight filtration on local cohomology with support in generic determinantal varieties.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究广义旗簇上以闭Schubert簇为支集的局部上同调层，作为混合Hodge D-模，利用Kazhdan-Lusztig理论和Saito混合Hodge模理论计算其简单合成因子、Hodge过滤和权过滤。
AI.motivation: 研究广义旗簇上以Schubert簇为支集的局部上同调层的结构，这些层具有自然的混合Hodge D-模结构。需要开发系统方法来计算这些模的合成因子和过滤结构，这对理解代数簇的局部几何和表示论有重要意义。
AI.method: 采用Kazhdan-Lusztig理论和Saito混合Hodge模理论，主要工具是Grothendieck-Cousin复形。证明该复形支撑混合Hodge模复形结构，从而具有Hodge和权过滤。利用严格性，计算上同调与取过滤的相伴分次可交换。
AI.result: 成功计算了Grassmannian中Schubert簇的合成因子和权过滤，证明权过滤由Raicu-Weyman的增强Dyck模式控制。通过限制到对偶大胞腔，恢复了以一般行列式簇为支集的局部上同调的简单合成因子和权过滤。
AI.conclusion: 建立了计算广义旗簇上局部上同调模结构的系统方法，将几何问题转化为表示论问题，为理解Schubert簇和行列式簇的局部上同调提供了新工具，连接了几何、表示论和混合Hodge理论。
